title: Quantum mechanics
description: A quiz related to quantum mechanics. $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.$$

questions.question: Which is correct? $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.$$
answers: Quantum mechanics describes nature at the smallest scale. $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.$$
Quantum mechanics describes nature at the highest scale. $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.$$

questions.question: Who is the originator of quantum theory?
What describes the wave function or state function of a quantum-mechanical system?
